title: Weld your own titanium cranks with the new Cane Creek eeWings DIY kit
content:
DIY. You just appreciate things more when you do them yourself, right? Maybe you already dabble in your own bike repair. Perhaps, you’ve even tried your hand at building your own frame. If that’s the case, then you might want to check out Cane Creek’s latest option for their titanium cranks – the eeWings DIY […]

The post Weld your own titanium cranks with the new Cane Creek eeWings DIY kit appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
